snippet: Rodney Stuckey scored 29 points, and the Detroit Pistons ended a 10-game skid in Atlanta with a 102-95 victory over the Hawks.
abstract: Detroit Pistons beat Atlanta Hawks, 102-95, ending a 10-game losing streak; Hawks hold two-game lead over New York Knicks for the final Eastern Conference playoff spot; other basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Rodney Stuckey scored 29 points, and the Detroit Pistons ended a 10-game skid in Atlanta with a 102-95 victory over the Hawks.
